com.gwidgets.api.leaflet

Interface Layer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Canvas, Circle, CircleMarker, DivIcon, FeatureGroup, GeoJSON, GridLayer, Icon, ImageOverlay, LayerGroup, Marker, Polygon, Polyline, Popup, Rectangle, Renderer, SVG, TileLayer, Tooltip, WMS

    @JsType(isNative=true)
public interface Layer
    Represents an object attached to a particular location (or a set of locations) on a map. Implemented by tile layers, markers, popups, image overlays, vector layers and layer groups.
    Author:
    Zakaria Amine

      • bindTooltip

        L bindTooltip(java.lang.String content,
              TooltipOptions options)
        Binds a tooltip to the layer with the passed *content and sets up the neccessary event listeners. If a Function is passed it will receive the layer as the first argument and should return a String or HTMLElement.
        Parameters:
        String - the tooltip content as a string
        TooltipOptions - the options object of this tooltip
        Returns:
        the L class

      • bindTooltip

        L bindTooltip(HTMLElement content,
              TooltipOptions options)
        Binds a tooltip to the layer with the passed *content and sets up the neccessary event listeners. If a Function is passed it will receive the layer as the first argument and should return a String or HTMLElement.
        Parameters:
        HTMLElement - the tooltip content as a HTMLElement object
        TooltipOptions - the options object of this tooltip
        Returns:
        the L class

      • bindTooltip

        L bindTooltip(Tooltip content,
              TooltipOptions options)
        Binds a tooltip to the layer with the passed content and sets up the neccessary event listeners. If a Function is passed it will receive the layer as the first argument and should return a String or HTMLElement.
        Parameters:
        HTMLElement - the tooltip content as a ToolTip object
        TooltipOptions - the options object of this tooltip
        Returns:
        the L class
